review: This Firestick is a good alternative to Roku. I have both of them and often use the firestick and it just keeps on streaming and streaming and working as intended. If you are already an Amaxon Prime member then this is for you. And at a pretty good price too. You only insert your email and password one time and that's it. Amazon remembers you each time. What's not to like?
